CustomField.description: This field identifies the class to be used as a logger factory, which can be dynamically loaded using the rflib_LoggerUtil.getFactory() method. This class will then be instantiated and used to create the logger instance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please provide the name of the Apex class implementing the rflib_LoggerFactory interface. This class will be dynamically instantiated and used to create a rflib_Logger instance. Please use caution when changing the default value "rflib_LoggerFactory".
CustomField.label: Logger Factory Class
